# Draft:Harshwardhan Saiwala

Harshwardhan Saiwala is an Mumbai based liaison officer and policy consultant based in Mumbai, Maharashtra. Known for his work in coordinating between government agencies and private stakeholders, he has played a key role in facilitating civic and administrative projects across Maharashtra. Saiwala has been recognized for his contributions in the field of governance liaison, and has maintained working relations with several senior bureaucrats and political leaders.
Career
Saiwala began his career in public liaison and consultancy in 2012, initially working with All Department of Maharashtra State. Over time, he expanded his network to include key figures in urban development, public administration, and policy outreach. He has worked on various government-related initiatives in infrastructure, citizen engagement, and investment facilitation.
Awards and Recognition
In 2018 & 2021, he was honored with the Samaaj ratna Puraskar by reputed ngo of mumbai for his contribution to counsultancy.
Social and Youth Engagement
Outside his professional engagements, Saiwala has contributed to youth outreach programs, participated in civic development forums, and supported mentorship initiatives focused on leadership and governance.
